pages.text: $(marked)Lycanthropy$() is a ferocious disease that scars the mind, the body, and the soul. Under a full moon, its victims transform into $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)$(marked)Werewolves$() craving fresh meat. While physically strong, $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)$(marked)Silver$(). It will harm them, as will $(l:bewitchment:introduction/crops)$(item)Aconite$(). Werewolves also exclusively feed on meat, no matter their form.

Their weakness to Silver also implies an inability to hold tools such as an $(item)Athame$() for too long.$(br2)Lycanthropy is contracted from another Werewolf -as long as it's not a newly infected lycanthrope- while under the curse of $(l:bewitchment:curses/susceptibility)$(marked)Susceptibility$(); you must still $(l:bewitchment:poppets/death_protection)somehow$() survive though.$(br2)$(o)That sounds like a wonderful idea!$()
